title: Fr. Larry Richards - Discerning God's Will
description:
Presented by Lighthouse Catholic Youth: Ã¢â‚¬Å“How do I know what God wants?Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Knowing the will of God can be an intimidating topic for people of all ages. In this talk, Fr. Larry Richards, the founder of The Reason for Our Hope foundation, delves into the process of discernment. With personal stories, practical steps, and sound advice, Fr. Larry encourages all of us to dedicate ourselves to living the life that God has planned for us. It is in living this life that we will be truly happy.
